data.comment: The match is underway in Benevento.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Antonio Giua awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Benevento get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Benevento in the half of Genoa.
Antonio Giua signals a Genoa throw-in in Benevento's half.
Throw-in Benevento.
In the minute 5, In Benevento a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 9, Free kick Genoa.
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Benevento in the half of Genoa.
Benevento pushes forward through Gaetano Letizia, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Benevento close to the penalty box.
In the minute 13, Mattia Bani (Genoa) has received a first yellow card.
In Benevento Benevento attack through Gianluca Caprari. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Benevento.
In the minute 15, Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Genoa.
Eldor Shomurodov (Genoa) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Antonio Giua awards Benevento a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Benevento's Gaetano Letizia gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Marko Pjaca for Genoa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Benevento have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Benevento to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Benevento just outside Genoa's area.
Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 23, Goal kick for Genoa at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Benevento to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Antonio Giua.
In the minute 25, Benevento's Alessandro Tuia attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Antonio Giua awards Genoa a goal kick.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Corner awarded to Genoa.
Eldor Shomurodov of Genoa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Genoa.
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gaetano Letizia for Benevento who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 34, Can Benevento get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Antonio Giua.
Beneventoâ€™s Gaetano Letizia is on his feet again at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Benevento.
Genoa have a goal kick.
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Benevento.
In the minute 37, Riccardo Improta of Benevento gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Benevento.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 41, Antonio Giua signals a Benevento throw-in in Genoa's half.
Throw-in for Genoa at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Benevento needs to be cautious. Genoa have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Genoa at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Benevento's Gianluca Caprari has been booked in Benevento.
Antonio Giua awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Genoa in the half of Benevento.
In the minute 45, Genoa have a dangerous throw-in.
Antonio Giua blows to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Benevento in the half of Genoa.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Antonio Giua.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Benevento.
Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Genoa.
In the minute 52, Genoa have been awarded a corner by Antonio Giua.
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
In Benevento a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 55, Genoa's Stefano Sturaro gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Benevento defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Genoa in Benevento.
Genoa push upfield but Antonio Giua quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 57, Goal! Roberto Insigne gives Benevento a 1-0 lead in Benevento.
Ivan Radovanovic is on a sub for Stefano Sturaro for Genoa.
Genoa make their first substitution with Domenico Criscito replacing Lennart Czyborra.
In the minute 59, Goran Pandev is replacing Eldor Shomurodov for the away team.
Genoa to take a throw-in in Benevento territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
Roberto Insigne (Benevento) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Benevento, Benevento push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Genoa will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Benevento.
Edoardo Goldaniga (Genoa) has received a yellow card from Antonio Giua.
In the minute 69, Benevento push forward at Stadio Ciro Vigorito and Gianluca Caprari gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Genoa defence.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Antonio Giua.
Can Benevento get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Genoa.
Genoa are pushing forward but Edoardo Goldaniga's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Benevento at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
In the minute 72, The away team have replaced Mattia Destro with Gianluca Scamacca. This is the fourth substitution made today by Rolando Maran.
Free kick Benevento.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
In the minute 74, The home team replace Roberto Insigne with Andres Tello.
Throw-in Benevento.
Antonio Giua signals a Benevento throw-in in Genoa's half.
In the minute 75, Davide Zappacosta is on a sub for Edoardo Goldaniga for Genoa.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Genoa close to the penalty box.
Genoa drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Marco Sau is replacing Gianluca Caprari for the home team.
In the minute 79, Filippo Inzaghi (Benevento) is making a third substitution, with Giuseppe Di Serio replacing Gianluca Lapadula.
Filippo Inzaghi is making the team's fourth substitution at Stadio Ciro Vigorito with Daam Foulon replacing Alessandro Tuia.
Throw-in for Benevento at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Antonio Giua signals a free kick to Benevento.
In the minute 83, Benevento attack but Riccardo Improta's header doesn't find the target.
Genoa have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Genoa in the half of Benevento.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Benevento.
Davide Zappacosta for Genoa drives towards goal at Stadio Ciro Vigorito. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 86, In Benevento a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
Can Benevento get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
In the minute 87, Andres Tello (Benevento) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Benevento.
In the minute 89, Andrea Masiello is booked for the away team.
Benevento have extended their lead to 2-0 courtesy of a Marco Sau penalty.
Throw-in Benevento.
Antonio Giua will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick for Benevento in the half of Genoa.
Benevento are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Genoa's Marko Pjaca breaks free at Stadio Ciro Vigorito. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Antonio Giua awards Benevento a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Genoa.
Benevento have a goal kick.
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
